about_the_game:
In Choppy Cuts, fun and chaos go hand in hand. You can team up with friends to tackle a variety of hairdressing challenges. Work together to create amazing hairstyles and have a blast along the way!


💈Be Quick! 💈
Whatever it is, just toss it over — even the customers! Efficiency is our top priority!



🪒Team up! 🪒
Ready to go for three stars? Every task demands precision and perfect teamwork. Rally your friends and show off your team spirit!



✂️Snip and clip! ✂️
Pick your hairstylist character, wield a range of unique tools, and journey through diverse universes, leaving no hair uncut!



The game is currently in its early demo stage and is under continuous development. Stay tuned for exciting updates, including new levels, modes, characters, outfits, and much more!
We truly value every player's experience and are committed to staying closely connected with our community. Your feedback is essential in helping us create a more complete and enjoyable game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-1185G7 @ 3.00GHz 1.80 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to Choppy Cuts! In this light-hearted multiplayer co-op game, you'll become hair salon employees, working together to meet the diverse needs of various customers. Through teamwork, you'll complete a series of hairdressing tasks, earn bonuses, and challenge your skills.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Thai, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
